title: Now... I have become DEATH
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]] 
[[/>]]

+ SCP-2935 Artwork!

+++++ //By: Noice_1//


> "Now I have become Death, the destroyer of worlds"
> - Bhagavad Gita (also in Oppenheimer)

[[code]]
Note: This took me a few hours of free handing a cave. I've tried to add as 
much detail as possible. I wanted to add graves and tombstones, but I
thought it would ruin it. Please enjoy, and tell me if there is 
ANY single thing I should change!

Thank you, and lots of love!
[[/code]]

------

++ **The Art**

[[image unnamed.jpeg size="medium"]]

++++++ The Entrance of SCP-2935, moments before Agent Keller goes back home...

> "The world did not go out with a bang, nor an explosion, nor a whisper, but with tranquility"
> - Noice_1
author: Noice_1
